channel.title: 508/525 (517) Adding tormented demons
channel.description:
hey guys i recently added tormented demons to my 517 server , but when i add them to npclist.cfg ( to give them more hp) and i run my server again i get this error [code]Starting server on port: 43594 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 9000 at net.com.codeusa.npcs.loading.LoadNPCLists.newNPCList(LoadNPCLists.java:128) at net.com.codeusa.npcs.loading.LoadNPCLists.loadNPCList(LoadNPCLists.java:95) at net.com.codeusa.npcs.loading.LoadNPCLists.<init>(LoadNPCLists.java:20) at net.com.codeusa.Engine.<init>(Engine.java:161) at net.com.codeusa.Server.main(Server.java:69)[/code]
if i compile , there are no errors.
Plz help

item.title: 508/525 (517) Adding tormented demons
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“mod mageman, post:1, topic:352463”]hey guys i recently added tormented demons to my 517 server , but when i add them to npclist.cfg ( to give them more hp) and i run my server again i get this error Starting server on port: 43594 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 9000 at net.com.codeusa.npcs.loading.LoadNPCLists.newNPCList(LoadNPCLists.java:128) at net.com.codeusa.npcs.loading.LoadNPCLists.loadNPCList(LoadNPCLists.java:95) at net.com.codeusa.npcs.loading.LoadNPCLists.<init>(LoadNPCLists.java:20) at net.com.codeusa.Engine.<init>(Engine.java:161) at net.com.codeusa.Server.main(Server.java:69)

if i compile , there are no errors.

Plz help[/quote]

It means 9000 is to big, you need to lower it to lower number that isn’t over the set amount in your npc handling class. It looks like it is higher then the set amount in your npclist.

Wrong section should be in the Help section.

Read full topic

item.description:
